dublin_core.dcvalue: This white paper identifies best practices and specific programmatic operational policy and global strategy recommendations to promote the scale up of mHealth in developing countries through an assessment of current implementations of mHealth programs and interviews of mHealth experts Profiled in this report are several mHealth programs that have been piloted and are currently in the scale up phase and have proven enough success that they should be considered as models for other initiatives to follow Why it helps with planning Profiles 9 mHealth programs currently in the scale up phase documenting best practices for implementation expert tips and recommendations programmatic operational policy and global strategy
Scaling Up Mobile Health: Elements Necessary for the Successful Scale Up of mHealth in Developing Countries
Scaling Up Mobile Health: Elements Necessary for the Successful Scale Up of mHealth in Developing Countries
